review: Simple and love it! Only thing is that I wish I could stream/cast from my computer more easily. It stutters and if I play my own content to stream, the picture lags behind the audio. But good if you just like Netflix/Hulu/YouTube and have a smartphone.
author: Jenny

review: You can't go wrong with a Chromecast, it gives you so much for so little. And with updates it is only going to get better.
author: Baltazar Najarro

review: Everyone at my son's household seem to enjoy this very much. I really don't know that much about it, I do know you can stream Hulu, Netflix and other things through to your tv which make s it great that you can see it on a bigger screen. Haven't heard any complaints.
author: Thefoxesden2000

review: I don't know why it's made this way, maybe it has to be, but it doesn't simply mirror what's on the screen, as it should. You have to have apps that are compatible with it, for some reason, and there aren't that many. For instance streaming a podcast is easy, showing your photos is a total pita.
author: Ilo O. Kratins "cabinet pro"

review: Love the way this works!  Only got 3 stars because right now it only has a couple apps available.  When this thing really takes off it will be a 5 star.
author: Adam

review: I thought this would be a good workaround to enjoying Xfinity.com's online library of programming on our bedroom tv. It works--I guess. It's just really laggy. The audio and video is so out of sync, it's like watching a poorly dubbed kung-fu movie. On the other hand, Netflix actually works really well...but I already have a Roku for that purpose. I'll probably keep the chromecast and use it when I travel. But I don't think it's going to get as much home use as I originally thought.
author: Rob S.

review: We use it all the time. Great for sending TV shows from Netflix or videos from YouTube for the kids to the TV. We will be ordering another so we get it back on our main TV. Picture quality is great. Occasional buffering issues, but otherwise no problems.
author: Michelle Hermann
